title: Roofs, Washington Square
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Edward Hopper [1882-1967], New York, NY and South Truro, MA; Frank K. M. Rehn [1886-1956], New York, NY by November 1933 [1]; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY [2]; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, April 1954 until February 14, 1987 [2]; Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Notes:
[1]. The drawing was exhibited (no. 41, illustrated in the catalogue) in "Edward Hopper Retrospective Exhibition" held at the Museum of Modern Art, New York, NY, November - December 1933. It is listed as "Collection Frank K. M. Rehn, New York."
[2]. Mrs. Beal purchased the drawing from the Rehn Gallery through Mr. Rehn's assistant, John Clancy (see "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, pages 43-44, 95.)

creator.birth_place: Nyack (Rockland county, New York state, United States)
